name: Pong Invasion
description:
The game may take a while to load, so please be patient.

Pong Invasion is a brick breaker game with a twist made in one day for 5D5G. 

Objective

Destroy all of the red squares with your ball in each level.

Controls
  • AD/Left and Right Keys - Move paddle
  • Press the start button in a level to start the level.
  • Press the retry button during a level to reset the level.
  • Press the menu button while playing a level to return to the title screen.
  • Press the next button after beating a level to continue to the next one.

Have fun!
